category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 20 (North-South Sports Exchange Committee)
contents: Article 20 (North-South Sports Exchange Committee) The North-South Sports Exchange Committee shall respond to the chairman's advice on the following matters. Revised 2019. 1. 31., 2023. 7. 5. 1. All matters related to the inter-Korean sports talks 2. Matters related to the formation and participation of a single North and South Korean team in international competitions 3. Matters related to inter-Korean training and mutual leader invitations 4 Matters related to participation in sports competitions held in both North and South Korea 5. Matters related to exchange of sports information and mutual cooperation between North and South Korea 6. Matters related to consultation and coordination with relevant ministries related to sports issues between North and South Korea 7. Other matters related to inter-Korean sports. Matters considered to be in accordance with the functions of the Exchange Committee and submitted by the Chairman [This Article Newly Established on April 3, 2017]
